title: [dr-autosync] set cluster to dr-autosync mode,  min-resolved-ts is still 0 after run some transactions
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
sh-4.2# /tiup/deploy/tikv-20160/bin/tikv-server -V
TiKV
Release Version:   6.5.3
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   87e946d363cd1603e60f638b8f2e3dcf4c37e600
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.6.0
UTC Build Time:    2023-07-21 01:40:37
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release

[root@hongmei tiuptest]# ke pd1-0
sh-4.2# /tiup/deploy/pd-2379/bin/pd-server -V
Release Version: v6.5.3-drautosync
Edition: Community
Git Commit Hash: bd94a98fa1268da6073efd7a67aa29bf9b2ccfc0
Git Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.5.3-drautosync
UTC Build Time:  2023-07-24 06:26:35

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

```
[2023/07/25 12:40:01.165 +08:00] [INFO] [cmd.go:141] ["Start remote command"] [cmd="go-tpc tpcc run -D tpcc --host tiup-peer.dr-autosync-hongmei-testbedcw7cb -P3390 --warehouses 10 -T 50 --time 36000m --ignore-error '2013,1213,1105,1205,8022,8028,9004,9007,1062' --user root --password '' --interval '10s'"] [nodename=benchtoolset]
```
After run tpcc 30min in dr-auto-sync mode, check current ts in sql or get min-resolved-ts in pd, both is 0.

### What did you expect?

### What did happened?

sh-4.2# date;tiup ctl:v6.5.3 pd -u pd1-peer:2379 min-resolved-ts
Tue Jul 25 13:18:30 CST 2023
Starting component `ctl`: /root/.tiup/components/ctl/v6.5.3/ctl /root/.tiup/components/ctl/v6.5.3/ctl pd -u pd1-peer:2379 min-resolved-ts
{
  "is_real_time": true,
